Subscription.Query:
<QueryList>
<!--The purpose of this XML file is for use of configuring WEC --> <!-- New/Modified Scheduled Tasks --> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4698' or EventID='4699' or EventID='4700' or EventID='4701' or EventID='4702')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Services Started/Stopped/Restarted/Installed --> <Query Id="2" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID='7035')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Service Installed --> <Query Id="3" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System(EventID='7045')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--All of Sysmon --> <Query Id="4" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational">*</Select> </Query>
<!--Audit Log Clearing --> <Query Id="5" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='1102')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--New/Deleted Users, and Computers --> <Query Id="6" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4720' or EventID='4726' or EventID='4741' or EventID='4743')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Security Local/Global Groups Created/Deleted--> <Query Id="7" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4727' or EventID='4730' or EventID='4731' or EventID='4734')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Object Added/Deleted to Local/Global Security groups--> <Query Id="8" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4728' or EventID='4729' or EventID='4732' or EventID='4733')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Blocked By SRP --> <Query Id="9" Path="Application"> <Select Path="Application">*[System[(EventID='866')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--New/Deleted Virtual Machines and VHD's(Hyper-V)--> <Query Id="10" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Hyper-V-VMMS-Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Hyper-V-VMMS-Operational">*[System[(EventID='27310' or EventID='27311')]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="11" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Hyper-V-VMMS-Admin"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Hyper-V-VMMS-Admin">*[System[(EventID='13002' or EventID='13003')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Accounts Enabled/Disabled --> <Query Id="12" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4722' or EventID='4725')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Account Logon(Successful)--> <Query Id="13" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4624')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Account Failed Logon--> <Query Id="14" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4625')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Attempted Password Change/Reset--> <Query Id="15" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4723' or EventID='4724')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Logging on with different credentials than currently logged on with--> <Query Id="16" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4648')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--User account locked out--> <Query Id="17" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='4740')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Powershell Commands--> <Query Id="18" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Powershell/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Powershell/Operational">*[System[(EventID='4104' or EventID='24577')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Reboots --> <Query Id="19" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID='1074')]]</Select> </Query>
<!--Cylance Alerts--> <Query Id="20" Path="Application"> <Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[(@Name='CylanceSvc')]] and (EventID='2')]</Select> </Query>
<!--Domain Admin activity -->
<!--New/Deleted DNS Records -->
</QueryList>
